title: The Young Men’s Style Council of TikTok
abstract: A new generation of fashion boys is using the app to help young men talk about fashion.

multimedia.caption: Name: Etienne Bolduc Handle: @thedigitalcowboy Age: 27 Offline: Recently completed a master’s degree in Condensed Matter Physics and a second bachelor’s degree with a joint major in computer science and fine arts Also found on: Instagram, Discord, Patreon, YouTube, My Clothing Archive podcast Aesthetic: Grounded takes on the great Japanese intellectualists TikTok approach: Clever and sometimes comical historian of fashion — “What I like about collecting fashion is it’s not very linear. It’s a very complex system, and what’s fun is making the connections. Many people are more into the idea of completeness, they’re looking for the end goal of something. In my case, I’m only invested in the whole process.”
